item.description:
Curious about the club and/or membership?

Stay at the club from Fri, Feb 13th to Sun, Feb 15th to experience an event filled weekend!

Friday night:
Arrive after 7pm & meet the club members during a welcoming reception and club tour...likely to visit the Red Parka Pub for some live entertainment.

Saturday - Ski any of the various mountains nearby:
Attitash (3 miles away) ATP Freeride Series - Big Air Event
Wildcat (25 min drive) Corona Weekend with DJ Brian Sparhawk with various contests and give aways
Bretton Wood’s (40 min drive)
Black Mountain (10 min drive) Valentines 8-minute Chair Lifts, $39 lifts & Ladies ski free!
Great Glen Trails for Cross-country skiing

Saturday evening:
Apres-ski social attend an interactive Dating Game from 4p-7p

Night-social event hosted at the Innitous from 9p-1a featuring tasty BLUE beverages!
**Invitations are $12 each with a guest pass from the Innitous.

Sunday:
Hit the slopes again among the various mountains in the area for some early tracks or explore the quaint downtown shops of North Conway.
**Since this is a holiday weekend, the fun continues Sunday afternoon with a Beer Tasting event from 4p-7p

For more information about Mountain Events, please visit their website

Lodging accommodations:
We have separate male and female bunkrooms, so guests will need to bring up their own bedding and bath towels. We have a full kitchen, but space is limited in the refrigerator and we have lots of essentials already for common use.

Weekend Package Rate of $70
Includes: 2 nights of guest lodge fees $20 per night, both social events $24, and welcome reception. Stay extension through Monday President's Day may be possible for an additional $20 guest lodge fee.

Payment should be handled upon arrival with the Weekend Host. Additional costs (i.e. lift tickets) for the weekend activities is not included. Must be 21+ to stay at the club.

Contact Gina for more information and to RSVP…space is limited!
item.how_to_find_us: Myself or other Innitou member will be there to greet you!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: New Guest Weekend at the Innitou Ski Club - Feb 13th to Feb 15th
